I didn't expect that this series will be that great, and i was wrong. Now portal is one of my fav franchise. Great level design, excellent plot and story, and a total improvement from portal 1. It's so polished now. Well what i'm saying is... it's worth it a lot. I'll reccomend you play potal 1 first tho, and of course half life. Bcs they shared the same Universe

i played the coop with a friend that never played any portal before in his life...
10/10 would do again

Portal 2, in my opinion, is the only great game Valve has ever created. After being underwhelmed by the Half-Life and Left 4 Dead franchises, Portal 2 was a breath of fresh air. Between the decent graphics, phenomenal puzzle design, cooperative campaign, and overall game length, this game is one I can recommend during a sale.
